features: Value pack of two 8-fluid ounce bottles of Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser with vitamin C & ginseng, in special edition Care with Pride packaging, to nourish & refresh skin while removing dirt, oil & impurities that build up overnight

Daily face wash helps gently remove dead skin cells and cleanse skin, and features an invigorating citrus fragrance with grapefruit and ginger extract that energizes your senses so you're ready to face the day

Its unique oil-free formula is made with vitamin C and ginseng for a burst of energy and vitamins that'll wake you up and leave skin feeling beautiful and invigorated. The gentle lather rinses clean from face, so it won’t clog pores

Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Wash Facial Cleanser 9.1oz or Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser 8oz must be purchased from 5/14/22 – 7/17/22.
body.description: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser nourishes while removing dirt, oil & impurities that build up overnight. Designed with vitamin C & ginseng to clean & energize, this oil-free face wash removes dead skin cells & cleanses skin. This citrus face wash is oil-free & hypoallergenic, & rinses clean so it won't clog pores. The cleanser features a special edition Care with Pride packaging as part of the Johnson & Johnson Consumer Health Care with Pride program. You buy, we donate*. $1 donation to Family Equality for each Specially labelled Care with Pride Limited Edition Pride Products purchased at participating online** & retail stores within the 50 U.S. & D.C. Products: Neutrogena Oil Free Acne Wash Facial Cleanser 9.1oz or Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser 8oz must be purchased from 5/14/22 – 7/17/22. A min/max $100,000/$125,0000 donation will be made. **Participating Products sold & shipped by Amazon.com, Inc. on Amazon.com.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser Wake up with Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser, which nourishes skin while removing dirt, oil and impurities that build up overnight. Designed to clean and energize, this nourishing daily face wash contains gentle exfoliators to help gently remove dead skin cells and cleanse skin. Its unique oil-free formula is made with brightening vitamin C and ginseng for a burst of energy and vitamins, and its invigorating citrus fragrance helps energize your senses so you're ready to face the day. Suitable for everyday use, this foaming facial cleanser can be used as part of your daily morning skincare routine and is ideal for normal, oily, and combination skin. This gentle citrus face wash is oil-free and hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and rinses clean so it won't clog pores.

UNIQUE OIL-FREE FORMULA Made with vitamin C and ginseng for a burst of energy and vitamins. SUITABLE FOR EVERYDAY USE This foaming facial cleanser can be used as part of your daily morning skincare routine and is ideal for normal, oily, and combination skin. REMOVES DIRT AND OIL Daily face wash that nourishes skin while removing dirt, oil & impurities that build up overnight.

HEALTHY-LOOKING SKIN ROUTINE CLEANSE Cleanse your skin of dirt and oil with Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser. TREAT Toner and serum can help prep and treat your skin. MOISTURIZE Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate and treat your skin. PROTECT If you're prepping for the day, don't forget to apply sunscreen! We recommend using a minimum of SPF 30 to product your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays.

Clean & Clear Morning Burst Facial Cleanser, 8 Fl. Oz Clean & Clear Night Relaxing Deep Cleaning Face Wash, Oil-Free, 8 Fl. Oz Clean & Clear Essentials Deep Cleaning Astringent, 8 Fl. Oz Clean & Clear Essentials Dual Action Moisturizer, 4 Fl. Oz Clean & Clear Persa-Gel 10 Acne Medication, 1 Oz Format Facial Cleanser Facial Cleanser Facial Astringent Facial Moisturizer Acne Spot Treatment Key Benefit Daily face wash that nourishes skin while removing dirt, oil & impurities that build up overnight; made with vitamin C and ginseng for a burst of energy and vitamins Made with deep sea minerals and sea kelp extract, this night face wash cleanses skin while helping you wind down. Made with salicylic acid, this clear pore astringent help fight breakouts and is suitable for use on all skin types. Part acne treatment, part moisturizer, it’s designed to help clear skin without over-drying Contains 10% benzoyl peroxide, the same prescription-strength formula recommended by doctors. Oil-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for my sensitive skin. And Great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good I use as hand soap
reviews.reviewText: I don’t use for face- it’s actually terrible for your face. But I use the offbrand and this brand as hand soap and love it. Smells good and makes my hands thoroughly clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best facial soap
reviews.reviewText: I only use this soap, it’s great and refreshing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works just great on my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT A 6 PACK!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 6 pack and only received 1. Returned and ordered replacement 6 pack... again only 1 delivered! Extremely frustrating. Will not try for a 3rd time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No exfoliating bits
reviews.reviewText: This wash leaves my face feeling clean and soft. I thought it had exfoliating bits but does not. I use with a netting cloth for exfoliating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is our favorite one of the clean and clear, use it daily and love the travel sizes for our travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great And works
reviews.reviewText: Love this! Smells great and makes my skin super soft. Only been using it a few days, & my skin has improved a bit.
